title: How to Make Eggless Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Cream the butter and sugar until soft and fluffy.
steps.description: Stir in the flour and cocoa powder to make a smooth dough.

steps.headline: Add baking powder, brown sugar, dry fruits and chocolate chips into the dough.
Add in the ground flax seeds, and knead dough until they're evenly incorporated in the dough.
Divide the dough into 24 pieces and cut it out in the shape of cookies.
Put the cookies on a backing sheet, making sure they're evenly spaced and have room to spread.
Bake cookies until the edges are golden brown, but the center is still soft (this should take 6-10 min).
Cool it and they are ready to eat.

text: Cream the butter and sugar until soft and fluffy. Stir in the flour and cocoa powder to make a smooth dough. Add baking powder, brown sugar, dry fruits and chocolate chips into the dough.  Add in the ground flax seeds, and knead dough until they're evenly incorporated in the dough.  Divide the dough into 24 pieces and cut it out in the shape of cookies.  Preheat the oven around 350°F.  Put the cookies on a backing sheet, making sure they're evenly spaced and have room to spread.  Bake cookies until the edges are golden brown, but the center is still soft (this should take 6-10 min).  Cool it and they are ready to eat.  Finished.
